thread.section_title: The Marmara Park Avenue - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A good surprie
thread.title_full: A good surprie - Review of The Marmara Park Avenue, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Dominique B
title: A good surprie
text: For anyone that stays in NYC either on business or for his own pleasure, this hotel offers a very good service (very agreable staff), spacious rooms with a nice decoration and an excellent location. Murray hill is a good place to stay in the city, plenty of restaurants and a walking distance from Herold square and Midtown.
